entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain mixed with wet snow near noon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with wet snow changing to snow in the evening. Snowfall amount possibly reaching 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023
